description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的政治人物，原正国级党和国家领导人。曾任中共中央政治局常委、第八届和第九届全国政协主席。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a former paramount-level Party and state leader. He served as a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee and Chairman of the 8th and 9th National Committees of the CPPCC.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会
en: National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的全国委员会，是中国人民爱国统一战线的组织形式。
description.en: The national committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, the organizational form of the Chinese people's patriotic united front.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任中华人民共和国主席、全国政协主席。
description.en: One of the former major leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as President of the PRC and Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任中共中央政治局常委、第十届和第十一届全国政协主席。
description.en: One of the former major leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee and Chairman of the 10th and 11th CPPCC National Committees.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会
en: Politburo Standing Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导机构，由中共中央总书记主持。
description.en: The highest leadership body of the Communist Party of China, chaired by the General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第三代中央领导集体的核心，曾任中共中央总书记、国家主席、中央军委主席。
description.en: The core of the third generation of the CPC central leadership, who served as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, President of the PRC, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局
en: Politburo of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的领导机构，由中央委员会全体会议选举产生。
description.en: The leadership body of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, elected by the plenary session of the Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任中共中央总书记、国务院总理。因在六四事件中对学生表示同情而被免职。
description.en: A former high-ranking leader in the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, serving as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee and Premier of the State Council. He was purged for sympathizing with the students during the Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 中国天津市下辖的市辖区，李瑞环的出生地。
description.en: A municipal district of Tianjin, China, and the birthplace of Li Ruihuan.

description.zh-cn: 李瑞环的妻子。
description.en: The wife of Li Ruihuan.

en: Beijing Institute of Civil Engineering and Architecture
Beijing University of Civil Engineering and Architecture

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的建筑类高等院校，李瑞环曾在此进修。
description.en: An institution of higher learning in architecture located in Beijing, China, where Li Ruihuan studied.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发动和领导的、在中国发生的政治运动，对中国社会造成了广泛而深远的破坏。
description.en: A political movement in China initiated and led by Mao Zedong, which caused widespread and profound damage to Chinese society.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任中共中央政治局常委、中央书记处书记。因在六四事件中对学生表示同情而被免职。
description.en: A former high-ranking leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, serving as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee and the Secretariat. He was purged for sympathizing with the students during the Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国天津市的地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Tianjin Municipality, People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 中国共产党天津市委员会
en: Tianjin Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在天津市的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Communist Party of China in Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 一项旨在缓解天津市水资源短缺的大型水利工程，在李瑞环主政天津期间兴建。
description.en: A large-scale water conservancy project aimed at alleviating water shortages in Tianjin, built during Li Ruihuan's tenure in the city.

description.zh-cn: 1989年发生在中国北京的抗议示威活动，最终被武力清场。该事件深刻影响了中国的政治格局。
description.en: Protests that took place in Beijing, China in 1989, which ended with a military crackdown. The event profoundly affected China's political landscape.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任中共中央政治局常委、中共中央组织部部长。
description.en: A former high-ranking leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, serving as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee and head of the CPC Organization Department.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央书记处

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央书记处
en: Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局及其常务委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The administrative body of the Politburo of the Communist Party of China and its Standing Committee.

nodes.id: 中央宣传思想工作领导小组

zh-cn: 中央宣传思想工作领导小组
en: Central Leading Group for Propaganda and Ideological Work

description.zh-cn: 曾是负责中华人民共和国宣传思想领域工作的中共中央议事协调机构，现为中共中央宣传思想文化工作领导小组。
description.en: Formerly a deliberative and coordinating body of the CPC Central Committee responsible for propaganda and ideological work in the PRC, now known as the Central Leading Group for Propaganda, Ideological and Cultural Work.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任中共中央政治局常委、全国人大常委会委员长。
description.en: A former high-ranking leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, serving as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任中共中央政治局常委、国务院总理、全国人大常委会委员长。在六四事件中采取强硬立场。
description.en: A former high-ranking leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, serving as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee, Premier of the State Council, and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress. He took a hardline stance during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任中共中央政治局委员、中央书记处书记、中宣部部长，长期负责意识形态工作。
description.en: A former high-ranking leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, serving as a member of the Politburo, a secretary of the Secretariat, and head of the Propaganda Department, with long-term responsibility for ideological work.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任中共中央政治局常委、国务院总理。
description.en: A former high-ranking leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee and Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第五代中央领导集体的核心，现任中共中央总书记、国家主席、中央军委主席。
description.en: The core of the fifth generation of CPC central leadership, currently serving as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, President of the PRC, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 由李瑞环创办的助学基金会。
description.en: A student aid foundation established by Li Ruihuan.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任北京市常务副市长，与李瑞环同为劳动模范出身的官员，是李瑞环的好友。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the executive vice mayor of Beijing. Like Li Ruihuan, he was a model worker who became an official and was a good friend of Li's.

description.zh-cn: 李瑞环长子，拥有麻省理工学院斯隆管理学院的MBA学位，曾就职于美林证券和瑞银。
description.en: Li Ruihuan's eldest son, holds an MBA from MIT Sloan School of Management and has worked for Merrill Lynch and UBS.

description.zh-cn: 李瑞环次子，曾任诺华制药中国区总裁，后创立德福资本。
description.en: Li Ruihuan's second son, former president of Novartis China, later founded GL Capital.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国直辖市，李瑞环曾在此长期主政。
description.en: A municipality of the People's Republic of China, where Li Ruihuan served as a long-term leader.

description.zh-cn: 李瑞环于1959年9月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Li Ruihuan joined the Communist Party of China in September 1959.

description.zh-cn: 李瑞环出生于天津市宝坻县霍各庄镇陈家口村。
description.en: Li Ruihuan was born in Chenjiakou Village, Huogezhuang Town, Baodi County, Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 王淑兰是李瑞环的妻子。
description.en: Wang Shulan is Li Ruihuan's wife.

description.zh-cn: 李振智是李瑞环的长子。
description.en: Li Zhenzhi is Li Ruihuan's eldest son.

description.zh-cn: 李振福是李瑞环的次子。
description.en: Li Zhenfu is Li Ruihuan's second son.

description.zh-cn: 李瑞环曾在北京建工业余学院工业与民用建筑专业学习。
description.en: Li Ruihuan studied Industrial and Civil Architecture at the Beijing Part-time Institute of Construction Engineering.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，李瑞环受到迫害并被迫停止工作。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Li Ruihuan was persecuted and forced to stop working.

description.zh-cn: 在胡启立出任天津市市长期间，李瑞环被任命为副市长，成为其助手。
description.en: While Hu Qili was the mayor of Tianjin, Li Ruihuan was appointed as vice mayor, serving as his assistant.

description.zh-cn: 李瑞环于1982年至1989年间担任天津市市长。
description.en: Li Ruihuan served as the Mayor of Tianjin from 1982 to 1989.

description.zh-cn: 李瑞环于1987年至1989年间担任中共天津市委书记。
description.en: Li Ruihuan served as the Secretary of the CPC Tianjin Municipal Committee from 1987 to 1989.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局

description.zh-cn: 李瑞环于1987年当选为中共中央政治局委员。
description.en: Li Ruihuan was elected as a member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee in 1987.

description.zh-cn: 在李瑞环担任中共中央政治局委员期间，赵紫阳是时任中共中央总书记。
description.en: During Li Ruihuan's tenure as a member of the Politburo, Zhao Ziyang was the General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 在六四事件后，李瑞环在中共十三届四中全会上被增补为中共中央政治局常委。
description.en: After the Tiananmen Square incident, Li Ruihuan was elevated to the Politburo Standing Committee at the 4th Plenary Session of the 13th CPC Central Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 李瑞环于1989年至2002年担任中共中央政治局常委。
description.en: Li Ruihuan served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CPC from 1989 to 2002.

description.zh-cn: 在李瑞环担任中共中央政治局常委期间，江泽民是时任中共中央总书记。
description.en: During Li Ruihuan's tenure as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee, Jiang Zemin was the General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 在六四事件后，李瑞环与乔石在职权范围内保护知识分子的行为，引起了江泽民、李鹏等保守派的强烈不满。
description.en: After the Tiananmen Square incident, the actions of Li Ruihuan and Qiao Shi to protect intellectuals within their authority caused strong dissatisfaction from conservatives like Jiang Zemin and Li Peng.

description.zh-cn: 在六四事件后，李瑞环与乔石在职权范围内保护知识分子的行为，引起了江泽民、李鹏等保守派的强烈不满。
description.en: After the Tiananmen Square incident, the actions of Li Ruihuan and Qiao Shi to protect intellectuals within their authority caused strong dissatisfaction from conservatives like Jiang Zemin and Li Peng.

description.zh-cn: 在六四事件后，李瑞环和乔石在各自职权范围内合作，尽可能地保护了一些知识分子。
description.en: After the Tiananmen Square incident, Li Ruihuan and Qiao Shi cooperated within their respective authorities to protect some intellectuals as much as possible.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 李瑞环于1993年至2003年担任第八届、第九届全国政协主席。
description.en: Li Ruihuan served as the Chairman of the 8th and 9th National Committees of the CPPCC from 1993 to 2003.

description.zh-cn: 李瑞环接替李先念出任全国政协主席。
description.en: Li Ruihuan succeeded Li Xiannian as Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 李瑞环卸任全国政协主席后，由贾庆林接任。
description.en: After Li Ruihuan stepped down as Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee, he was succeeded by Jia Qinglin.

description.zh-cn: 在主政天津期间，李瑞环主持兴建了引滦入津工程以缓解市民吃水难问题。
description.en: During his tenure in Tianjin, Li Ruihuan presided over the construction of the Luan River Diversion Project to alleviate the city's water shortage problem.

description.zh-cn: 李瑞环亲手创办了桑梓助学基金会。
description.en: Li Ruihuan personally founded the Sangzi Student Aid Foundation.

description.zh-cn: 2024年9月30日，李瑞环与温家宝共同出席了国庆75周年晚会。
description.en: On September 30, 2024, Li Ruihuan and Wen Jiabao attended the 75th National Day evening gala together.

description.zh-cn: 在2024年国庆75周年晚会上，李瑞环与温家宝分坐在习近平两边。
description.en: At the 75th National Day evening gala in 2024, Li Ruihuan and Wen Jiabao were seated on either side of Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 李瑞环与张百发同为青年突击队长出身，并且是好友。
description.en: Li Ruihuan and Zhang Baifa both started as leaders of youth shock brigades and were good friends.

description.zh-cn: 在主政天津期间，李瑞环以务实精神为民众办实事，兴建了引滦入津等一系列民生工程，在民众中取得相当不错的声誉。
description.en: During his tenure governing Tianjin, Li Ruihuan implemented practical projects for the public, including the Luan River Diversion Project, earning a very good reputation among the citizens.
